title: Trump can't run in 2028, but Gavin Newsom worries race won't happen
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has said he "probably won't" run for a third term. Gavin Newsom told Stephen Colbert he worries there won't be a 2028 election.

title: GOP lawmakers move to put Charlie Kirk on US coins
shortDescription: Two House Republicans are leading an effort to have late conservative activist Charlie Kirk memorialized on U.S. currency.

title: Trump White House raises shutdown stakes with mass firings threat
shortDescription: A government shutdown is fast approaching on Oct. 1, and the White House is using the threat of more federal workforce firings to pressure Democrats.

title: Trump warns 'it won't be good for the left' if violence continues
shortDescription: President Trump suggested Americans on the political right won't "take it anymore" if violence continues, warning it "won't be good for the left."

title: Trump warns of violence after ICE shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump blamed the "radical left" for violence. He did not provide evidence supporting his claim.

title: Obama slams Trump administration's Tylenol, autism announcement
shortDescription: The former president bashed Trump's Sept. 22 announcement claiming a link between Tylenol use and autism rates.

title: Trump says he doesn't know if 'sick guy' James Comey will be charged
shortDescription: President Trump says he doesn't know if former FBI Director James Comey will be prosecuted.

title: Why President Trump keeps showing up at all the big sports events
shortDescription: President Trump's second-term streak of attending marquee sporting events is unmatched in presidential history. Up next is the Ryder Cup.

title: What is an autopen? Why did the White House hang it in 'Walk of Fame?'
shortDescription: The White House put up a 'Presidential Walk of Fame,' and used an image of an autopen in place of Joe Biden's portrait. What is an autopen?

title: Trump White House prepares for layoffs in looming government shutdown
shortDescription: Calling Democratic spending demands 'insane,' the White House asked federal agencies to prepare for layoffs in a possible shutdown Oct. 1.

title: Trump trolls Biden with autopen stunt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump mocked Joe Biden with a display of his autopen signature at the "Presidential Walk of Fame" in the White House's West Wing.

title: Gavin Newsom fears there will be no 2028 presidential election
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom warned that the US may not see a presidential election in 2028, describing authoritarian actions by the Trump administration.

title: Trump fumes over teleprompter, escalator failures at U.N.
shortDescription: "This wasn’t a coincidence, this was triple sabotage at the UN," Trump said in a social media post. "They ought to be ashamed of themselves."

title: Trump, first lady get stuck on escalator
shortDescription: An escalator at the U.N. General Assembly lurched to a halt just after President Donald Trump and the first lady stepped onto it.

title: DC statue of Trump and Epstein holding hands removed, damaged
shortDescription: A protest art statue of Trump and Jeffrey Epstein holding hands was removed from the National Mall. Organizers say the park service did not warn them.

title: Newsom says he fears there will not be a 2028 presidential election
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom said he is worried there will not be a presidential election in 2028, calling the Trump administration’s actions “authoritarian.”
